text.div:
This code system http://www.fhir.org/guides/omhtofhir/CodeSystem/omh-temporal-relationship-to-meal defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
2-hours-postprandial 2 hours postprandialThe relative time 2 hours following a meal

name: omh-temporal-relationship-to-meal
title: Omh Temporal Relationship To Meal Code System
description: OMH datapoint schema type representing the measure of an Open mHealth data schema.   These concepts are used were suitable LOINC or SNOMED-CT concepts are not available.

concept.definition: The relative time 2 hours following a meal
